name: Liz's Pickled Shrimp
author: KATHLEEN20
summary: Wonderfully marinated shrimp perfect for a dinner party appetizer!  This makes tons of marinade so feel free to half the ingredients if you don't have three pounds of shrimp on hand.
ingredients: 3 pounds large shrimp - peeled and deveined
1  green bell pepper, cut into thin strips
2 dashes hot pepper sauce (e.g. Tabasco™), or to taste
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Add shrimp, and cook for about 5 minutes, until pink
Place the onion and green pepper in a large bowl
Add vegetable oil, ketchup, cider vinegar, sugar, mustard, and capers
Season with garlic powder, Worcestershire sauce, salt, pepper and hot sauce, and mix until well blended
Place shrimp into the bowl with the sauce, cover, and refrigerate until thoroughly chilled
